website_summaries.verdict: This kit comes with a downloadable beginners' guide for a foolproof experience.
pros: PDF beginners guide comes with this kit
Comes with two bamboo rolling mats, five pairs of chopsticks, rice spreader, and paddle
Bamboo is mold resistant and biodegradable
Comes with a 100 percent money back guarantee
cons: Some customers comment that the mats splinter after multiple uses

customer_reviews.title: Mats are a must for sushi making
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. My first time making sushi and it turned out nice. The mat is definitely needed for easy sushi making. I wrapped it with plastic wrap to prevent rice getting stuck in the crevices. I already have a couple if rice paddles but now I have an extra one 😂. The spreader worked really well. Overall a very nice kit.
customer_reviews.author: musiclover1

customer_reviews.title: So freaking awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was so freaking awesome !!! My new neighbor was home sick. So I bought this and surprised her with my half a"#?! s skills and bring a little Japan to her. Everything didn't look perfect but it tastes so freaking awesome She loved it and I have her the set as a gift. I'm buying myself one now as well 🤗 It was so easy you guys. Just take your time.. Have fun. The more love and good energy you put into the making of your food.. The better it is. Food is medicine.. And I'm this case this kit was the perfect perscription for homesick heart 💎❣️
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Loved using everything in the kit. I was a little nervous at first, but The material really helped.
customer_reviews.author: sweet Ambrosia

customer_reviews.title: Great sushi kit for someone who wants to learn a new skill!
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit on a whim, basically I just wanted to try to make Sushi for the first time. For the price you can't really go wrong! The mats were great and the everything else included was helpful. It comes with an online guide which is nice , but you can also go online and find a ton of videos on how to roll sushi. I've made about 4 rolls over the course of two nights and am really satisfied. Making rolls is a breeze and fun! A great starter kit for anyone interested in trying this out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leaver

customer_reviews.title: Kit worked well and was a huge help for a beginner like my self
customer_reviews.text: Used this kit for my first stab at rolling maki. Kit worked well and was a huge help for a beginner like my self. The spatula works well for flipping/cooling your rice (if you are making your own at home). The only reason I gave the kit 4 rather than 5 stars, is the fact that the chop sticks are held in pairs by stickers. The stickers are very hard to remove and leave a sticky residue that was very difficult to get off. I would suggest changing these to a paper wrapper with the sticky part only at the end where the paper overlaps. Other than that, I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Stafford

customer_reviews.title: excellent rolling mats
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying...wrap the mats in saran wrap. This makes for easy clean up. The bamboo sticks are straight and placed close together so there aren't big gaps in between and the cording is sturdy. The chopsticks are a good quality. The paddle and spreader are also good quality and don't bend when in use. It's nice that it comes with two mats as I can make sushi with my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great & awesome value!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ever making sushi. My husband was impressed that I did it so well. I really enjoy making sushi now and I'm actually having more tonight for dinner! I was impressed with all that was included for the price. I would have paid the same price just for the chopsticks alone!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great set and value
customer_reviews.text: The set had a coupon available when I purchased it. It’s amazing! I didn’t expect great quality when ordering because it’s a great price even without the coupon. The chopsticks have different designs on the end and I really love that. Worth noting: it’s easier to clean up if you wrap some cling film around the mat before rolling. A large ziplock bag is great too and can be washed. Save your money and skip the premise sushi. Make your own! It’s easy and this is a fab set for it.
customer_reviews.author: Vile

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: After a sushi class my husband and I took on our last cruise, I knew I wanted to try it at home with our girls. We used it for the first time this week and had a great time. Make sure to put plastic wrap around the bamboo mat for easy clean up. We didn’t receive our digital cookbook with the website came with the instructions so I plan on trying to download for the next time we try making sushi. The chop sticks that come with it are a nice quality. This was a fun activity for my homeschool girls as we learn about Japan in WWII, the atomic bombing and Battle of Midway.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to make sushi at home!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I expected. Received the beginners guide by PDF throuh my email after my order shipped. Tried it out and had success with my first attempt. I should have bought it years ago, I would have saved a ton on restaurant sushi. I didn't use the rice scoop, I just use a spatula, but I did use the rice spreader . If you soak it in cold water like the directions say, you should find that it spreads much easier than using your hands. Use saran wrap if you want to try the rice on the outside, otherwise you'll have a big mess on your mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This was really useful! Making sushi with these mats made it look professional! I also like that it came with chopsticks, a wooden spoon and another utensil to perfect our sushi! The only thing I didn’t like was cleaning the rice out of the mat after it dried a little. I put plastic wrap over the entire mat and made clean up a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Got them for my boyfriend for Christmas since he loves sushi, and ended up giving them to him early. We watched a YouTube video to learn how to do it (too broke for classes), and we definately still need practice but we're getting better! It's a super fun thing to do with friends or a S.O., and the kit includes two rolling mats, which was awesome for us so we could both do it together at the same time! It's a good way to get all the sushi you want for cheap too!
customer_reviews.author: Friday

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use and Cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: I love Sushi but have little experience in actually making it so I thought I would give it a shot. This kit is perfect for a beginner! So far I have made three recipes I had found and it was really easy with these mats, the spreader and rice spoon. I used some plastic wrap on top of the mat which made cleanup a real snap. I look forward to many Sushi experiences ahead of me. Nori and small grain rice are available at Amazon market also.
customer_reviews.author: Grizz

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: It comes with two mats which are nice, and reusable chopsticks. I can't make sushi without the mats, and I doubt anyone that has ever made sushi for the first time could. If you cover them in a layer of plastic wrap by wrapping them in a circle, you never have to clean them and the sushi comes off nice and easy, especially if you roll them inside out. Have fun, siracha and any fish with some mayo is a must, and avocado.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Better quality control definitely needed
customer_reviews.text: Product came decent. Only problem is the spreader came broken, and I got a splinter in my hand when unpacking it
customer_reviews.author: Robert N

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Also fun. I put the mats into a gallon freezer bag instead of wrapping them in seran to keep them clean. really nice little kit. Even the rice paddle comes in so handy because it's just the right shape to spread sticky rice thin. I keep it all in the thick plastic sack it came in. Use it all the time. I love it
customer_reviews.author: imaFox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great! All you'll ever need for making sushi on your own. The materials in the kit are of high quality and as long as you take care of them (hand washing, etc.) I don't see why it wouldn't hold up for a long time. Not sure if the chopsticks are made of bamboo, but they are wooden and really nice as well. I noticed some reviewers stated that they didn't get the downloadable .pdf how-to guide, but I did...about 2 days after the kit was delivered. Even the .pdf guide is really nice! High quality pics, informative, etc. If you're on the fence about buying this particular kit, do it...For the price, it's full-on worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: A kit that has great value
customer_reviews.text: The kit was a solid buy mainly because of the price and what you get in the kit. All of the pieces are high quality. The spoons are real wood and the sushi roller feels authentic. I also like that they provided more chopsticks. Even though chopsticks are cheap its hard to get them in a kit at this price
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it just for the spreader
customer_reviews.text: I made Korean Gim bap with the kit, and LOVED the spreader. It’s been awhile since I’ve made these rolled treats for back to school lunches because they can be a lot of work. The spreader was an amazing surprise- somehow that simple piece of wood made the arduous task of evenly spreading the rice on the lavar ( seaweed sheets) as easy as spreading peanut butter on toast. I usually struggle With trying to press and spread the rice onto the sheets with fork tines - this tool was a game changer. If you’re a cook you’ll love it!!
customer_reviews.author: safetymom

customer_reviews.title: Super nice little kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little starter kit for sushi makers! A little tip, because all the little slats in the mat can be hard to clean.... I put a gallon size zip-lock baggie over it and it makes it so much easier (plus it's easier than saran wrap). I just clean the baggie and replace.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit! I highly recommend it if you want to make nice looking rolls!
customer_reviews.author: Morgane B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product for its price
customer_reviews.text: Good product, everything works okay 👌🏽. When you open it it has a strong smell, like vinegar. The chopsticks are long, but they are slippery, so if you are learning how to eat with chopsticks 🥢 it will take you a while lol. For the price is very good, I highly recommend it, it has the basic supplies to make sushi.
customer_reviews.author: María Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Lots of extras!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for an at home dinner date for my wife’s birthday. Everything worked great, and the ebook was very helpful as well. I also didn’t realize it came with extra rolling mats and chop sticks, so that was an awesome surprise!
customer_reviews.author: thomas williams

customer_reviews.title: Made a decent sushi and hour after getting the kit.
customer_reviews.text: Real easy to do. Followed a YouTube instruction and had some sticky jasmine rice ready, cucumber, avocado, and seaweed sheets (nori). Took me 10 minutes and one try to get it right on my first roll. Life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use and made rolling sushi rolls a breeze. I'd recommend having some plastic wrap on hand to cover the board before placing down your ingredients. It makes it even easier to roll the sushi (the rice doesn't stick), and the bonus is you don't have to clean up afterward.
customer_reviews.author: MariaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality w/ Cute Chopsticks 🥢
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use it, but I’m excited! Great quality and I had no clue it came with 4 pairs of chopsticks I was so excited about that. They’re so cute! And I love a beginners manual is provided, because I don’t know what the hell I am doing. But I’m excited for my sushi making journey. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: AyeItsJanay

customer_reviews.title: Much needed
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. It was my first time making sushi and this was absolutely necessary and worked great. I was very happy with the result. Cleaned up well, easy to store. Very happy. The chopsticks and tools are very nice. I realized a very sharp knife is also very important for cutting sushi.
customer_reviews.author: Saraisme.

customer_reviews.title: Great little bundle for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for a basic sushi roller, but stumbled upon this nice little bundle and am happy I went for it. The sushi rollers work great, and the chopsticks that came with it are super cute! The spoon was also very helpful since I lost the one that came with my rice cooker. I would get this kit for anyone who wants to get started making sushi rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I can make my own sushi now! It's awesome. I love sushi but I hate how many hidden calories are really in it. I bought this and now I roll my own sushi with cauliflower rice or even sometimes just some laughing cow, cucumbers, and salmon - and bam I have a 75 calorie delicious roll of sushi.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for beginners! I've never made sushi before in my life, but these tools with some youtube video training were excellent. My family enjoyed so many California rolls at a fraction of the price... and the taste was just as good! This is a great kit for anyone starting their sushi making journey.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love love this !
customer_reviews.text: Since Covid we haven’t eaten out and we’re learning how to cook our favorite meals and sushi was on that list. We absolutely love this kit and we use it at least twice a month!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl E.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted to make sushi so we got this set. Its not bad came with everything that's on the picture. The only thing is the cleaning of the mat. The second time around we placed them in a gallon size zip lock bag and they work great. For the price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: raul villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Beginners set
customer_reviews.text: Mat is a little flimsy, I've had similar mats that I got for Chinese paint brushes. Also one that I got for a table trivet. Both had better design. But overall this set is ok. I'm by no means a professional sushi maker, and my rolls were a little on the loose side. Overall I think it's a great started kit, all it is missing is the wooden container to help to absorb some of the rice moisture when you're making the sushi rice.
customer_reviews.author: resa matsuda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Realistically for 6.99 you get two sushi mats, 1 spreader and 1 paddle and a bunch of chopsticks. Put mats inside ziploc bag and it worked awesome. I also purchased camp chef sushi bazooka shuziki or something like that. 6.99 for it as well. Both worked incredible and I would recommend you tube videos for what to do or not to do. Terrific value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: edmocon

customer_reviews.title: The making of the rice vinegar sauce.
customer_reviews.text: When I could not access the beginners' manual on line, I e-mailed one evening and found a very pleasant e-mailed reply early the next morning that provided just the link that I needed, and it was wonderful. It would be nice if the link that worked was prominently featured in the website where it belongs, as well as in the booklet that came with the sushi making tools.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Walter

customer_reviews.title: We just made sushi Friday night and I loved it. The kit was easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Hey there Allen. This is actually Josh's wife, Nicole. This was a Christmas gift for me this year (he did good). We just made sushi Friday night and I loved it. The kit was easy to use, well made, and my husband could even use the chopsticks and he can never use them when we go out! This is a great product and a wonderful gift! Thank you for your hard work and for following up with us. I will absolutely be recommending you to friend's and family. Happy New Years, The Hagemanns
customer_reviews.author: BALD FF

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love my sushi making kit. It was easy to use and the sushi came out perfect. I would recommend this to anyone that wants to make their favorite sushi at home. The wooden spread handle that comes with the kit was one of the best things about it, making it easy to get the rise across the sheet of seaweed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love our first sushi kit
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this kit! Used it a few times- and the more i use it the better I get! It comes with a PDF with tips on making sushi- the rice recipe was a bit too extensive for my needs and purposes so I just found a simpler recipe online. So happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Noel E. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Son and daughter in law's "wooden" (5th) anniversary and we wanted something useful (not just another dust collector) but unique. This should be it! They are first time sushi makers, so along with the rice and nori (seaweed) paper I think it will be useful *and* fun!
customer_reviews.author: Juli D. Kring

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My first sushi kit and I love it. I should have bought this a long time ago. Instead of paying for over priced sushi at the restaurant, now I can just make my own. My first attempt was actually really good. Just basic salmon and avocado roll.
customer_reviews.author: J Vanger

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use, even for beginners
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the instructions, this is a perfect sushi making kit. I had never made sushi before and really wanted to try it out. I bought this kit and it was so easy to use and my sushi came out looking sushi-chef made.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Don’t print the PDF file
customer_reviews.text: Good starter kit for beginner sushi chefs, however, beware of printing out the PDF file on a home printer because it uses a boat load of ink to print useless pages, some of them are white letters on black backgrounds. I could have bought a hardcover book for what the ink costs to print it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Harden

customer_reviews.title: Good, Cheap, Well Made
customer_reviews.text: If you think making sushi is hard, stop! Its not and this set will be a low-cost entry into the fun that is sushi-making. Pair this with a decent rice maker and you'll create tasty sushi at a fraction of the price of store/restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs Are Great

customer_reviews.title: Easy for me. My 7 yr old even rolled with it.
customer_reviews.text: I used it today. It was my first time making a sushi roll. Seemed easy to use. My roll was pretty tight and didn’t fall apart when I cut it up. I’m happy with it and would order it again. Oh but don’t forget to use plastic wrap between the roller and the food products.
customer_reviews.author: Trockbaby

customer_reviews.title: Must try!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this! So affordable for really great quality! I loved that he emailed a pdf for how to make sushi. I’ve made sushi many times before, but you can always learn a few things from other people. Which I did. He had a few tips and tricks in there that I really liked.
customer_reviews.author: Buckwheat91

customer_reviews.title: Great product - don’t expect pdf to be mailed though!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Got it for a party and soaked it in warm soapy (dawn) water then rinsed and set out to dry. The smell everyone talked about was gone after soaked and rinsing. They DO NOT email you a pdf as they say. The instructions included give you a website to go to. Haven’t tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny T

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen favorite
customer_reviews.text: This has become a staple in my kitchen. I love making rolls with it and it came with all the tools I could want or need. Love the chopsticks too! Just cover the rolling mat with plastic wrap so rice doesn't get caked all in the insides.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S. Richey :)

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and ease of use. There really is no cleaning required if you use as explained with plastic wrap or foil. I actually use the product to make herb butter rolls to freeze. it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 year old son since he has an obsession with sushi and he managed making it pretty well. Mats are always a bit messy with clean up. Chop sticks are nice (my son tries to eat everything with them). Hand wash them though.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Tendler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice kit.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as it should, for a first time sushi roll maker. Watched plenty of videos, and with a little practice I feel proficient at it. I've probably had sushi rolls three weekends in a row now. It is much easier to put the mat in a gallon freezer bag and roll it, then in between rolls just wipe the mess off the bag and roll another. I've now had request from people to make sushi rolls, my ego maybe over inflated now. Good product, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Great set, chopsticks are fantastic and the 2 mats ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set, chopsticks are fantastic and the 2 mats make the rolling a quicker process. The spoon and spreader thing in the set were very useful in handling and spreading the rice. The only slight problem is that it is quite hard to clean the bamboo mats and the rice gets stuck between the individual bamboo sticks. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Garay

customer_reviews.title: I added one star because it's not a big company selling those and I appreciate the effort
customer_reviews.text: The thing I didn't like was the size of and the feel of the bamboo mat, when I place the nori on top, it's almost the same size so it's harder to roll compared to a larger mat that I have. I like the art work on the chop sticks tho.
customer_reviews.author: hbotev

customer_reviews.title: I Love this kit
customer_reviews.text: I Love this kit! It’s so beautiful and professional. It is truly an amazing deal, I thought for sure that I’d have to pay more for everything that was included. And you get a great pdf download for beginner sushi makers, very professional and easy to follow. I am so excited to start rolling my own sushi! Thank you so much for my product, happy birthday to me!
customer_reviews.author: Momma bear

customer_reviews.title: Everything worked great..
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived as described, and as a matter of fact I am currently trying my first sushi roll tonight. Everything worked great...now if I could just get more proficient at chopsticks! I bet in a month, I will be an expert! Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R napier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for sushi!
customer_reviews.text: We made several different sushi rolls from this and were happy with all of them. I rinsed them off and put them away for next use - hope that is enough, it's difficult to tell since the only thing that should be touching is the seaweed wrapper.
customer_reviews.author: faye.martin@colostate.edu

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: I got this in hopes of starting to make sushi at home. Great starter kit. The mats do the job and make good sushi rolls. I put them in 1 gallon zip-lock bags when rolling to keep them clean and they still work even when inside the bag. I made the mistake of putting the rice serving spoon through the dish washer, and it has started to splinter a little bit, but I should have known better. Overall fine product and recommend it to any other sushi novices like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Chu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sushi making
customer_reviews.text: Great for sushi. The chop sticks are fairly cylindrical, so if you are use to the square ones you may need some practice. I put the mats in ziploc bags when rolling sushi. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ClaytonTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for New beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Good for beginners or if you need a small set to make your sushi. When you use the Sushi Mat make sure you use a plastic bag or plastic wrap so you can clean the mat easier.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money - Exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Missing Sushi during quarantine pushed me to try making it at home myself. This was a great starter kit and had everything I needed except the knife itself. Definitely recommend, the one tool had a slight splinter on the edge but nothing a little friction with a chopstick couldn't easily remedy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stokley

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as described & good quality. The chopsticks are so cute and I use them a lot. I’d recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci Bug

customer_reviews.title: Sushi for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kit for learning to make Sushi. It comes in a nice package for storing and has everything you need! feels very sturdy and well made. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Cute set but just okay
customer_reviews.text: Cute set, comes with two mats and 5 pairs of chopsticks. Only thing is the mats are starting to splinter a little. We followed the guy book in cleaning properly too
customer_reviews.author: Liane McGuigan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I made sushi for the first time and this kit made it so easy. A tip...watch some You Tube videos first...put a plastic bad around the mat as to not make the mat a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Dani M

customer_reviews.title: What a difference a Matt makes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried making sushi without a matt and it always falls apart. With this matt my 13 year old daughter and I both made decent rolls on the first try (not perfect, but good for the first time). We live the reusable chopsticks too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous set!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design! Delivered on time! I’m really impressed by this product and the over all price is really a great deal. I’m not too sure if this came with a PDF file that I’m supposed to receive?
customer_reviews.author: Cremar

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Item!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter set for the sushi enthusiast. Easy to use and they even include an online pdf on Beginners Guide to getting started... Great product from a Fantastic company.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Just wrap in plastic wrap and your good to go. No huge cleanup needed :). Very easy to use. Love it! Plus there is two, so you can always give one to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Family night
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because we love sushi and wanted to learn how to make it ourselves. This set is wonderful. We have enjoyed many nights as a family making and eating sushi at home.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Comes with instructions, easy for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I made California rolls with this for the first time and they turned out great! I wrap it in saran wrap then wipe my hands and board with rice vinegar and that helps keep the bamboo clean of debris. Highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic wrap the bamboo mat
customer_reviews.text: Bamboo is great quality. Before I use the mat, I wrap it in plastic wrap so I dont have to wash it directly and because its bamboo tied with strings, I dont want mold to grow on it.
customer_reviews.author: Arold Moua

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a great and inexpensive idea for date night! The chopsticks are super cute with little fish on them and it comes with simple instructions if you’ve never made sushi before. Only downside is I couldn’t get the pdf file to pull up. They wanted you to type in a super long url address. Other than that awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C

customer_reviews.title: So you want to make sushi
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners. Love all the pieces of the set. It’s not difficult in theory, but takes practice to get the rolls to stay together-user error, not these tools!
customer_reviews.author: Travellover

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This kit is very nice but honestly all you need are the roller mats. The rice sticks to the spoon and is hard to get off. Use a metal spoon. I have made many rolls of sushi with these. I just run mats under water to clean and let them air dry.
customer_reviews.author: harpster12

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit. We made our first sushi with this and no problems. Chop sticks are nice but super slippery or maybe we are used to wooden disposable ones lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This came in tact and on time. They are super nice for making sushi for first timers too. I really enjoyed that the pack came with so many chopsticks and tools other than just the rolling mats.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: High quality and functionality!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to make my own sushi and the the techniques I learned int he e-book provided! I make my sushi to take for lunch and my coworkers have mistaken my sushi for store-bought! Cleaning between the bamboo can be a bit hard if you are messy while making your roll, but with time and technique it gets a whole lot better. I would definitely by for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Jaricka Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and this was perfect for date ...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and this was perfect for date night. We have had friends come over and try it out too and they had a blast. I highly recommend using a cling-wrap with the sushi mat to make clean-up a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Easy To Use, Great Support
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and clean. Great price point. Outstanding customer support. I can make any kind of sushi rolls for a few dollars compared to a sushi bar. You can choose your own ingredients and guarantee freshness . A free instruction guide is also available. Lots of youtube videos and other online recipes are available as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought those for my mom because she likes making sushi but didn’t have one the bamboo mats and so far she loves it. It’s really easy to clean and use. Not to mention, great value for money because there are 2 bamboo mats, some chopsticks and a wooden spatula included. Great for at-home sushi making and beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the chop sticks.  Coated in slick hard too grip stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like the kit. Easy too use. But not a fan of the chop sticks at all. Slip and slide in your fingers. I’d prefer the cheap sticks over these any day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend putting them in a zip-lock bag instead of plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: The mats work well, I'd recommend putting them in a zip-lock bag instead of plastic wrap, it's easier to use and clean up. The chopsticks are nice, they are coated with a lacquer of some kind, don't soak up liquids. Same with the paddle and spreader, they are coated and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Not mold resistant, but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Mold grew on all over the set after storing in the plastic zip loc that came with the shipment. Was not usable anymore and had to throw out. Edit: customer service was great and offered a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: 100% use plastic wrap around the bamboo sheets or else cleaning will be a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: It took about 30 minutes for me to clean every piece of rice out of the rolling sheets, so next time i will add plastic wrap around it :(
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality materials for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for beginners! I had always wanted to make sushi at home, and decided to try this out. Hey, its $10 if it's not great I dint lose too much right? This is a steal for the quality you get! The chopsticks are so cute and high quality. The rolling mates themselves are so easy to use(and clean as long as you make sure to wrap it either in plastic wrap or a plastic freezer bag). A really great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anissa Manley

customer_reviews.title: Moldy
customer_reviews.text: It might be user error, but I had a very difficult time cleaning the mat (I've only used one so far) and it got moldy, so I had to dispose of it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Makes rolling sushi easy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! I had never made sushi before, but thought it would be fun to try. I ordered this kit, which came with two mats, a scooper, a spreader, and 5 pairs of chopsticks. Rolling sushi was so fun and easy that my whole family decided to try. Even my three-year-old son was able to easily and successfully create a beautiful Maki. The kids have been begging to do it again soon, and I know we will. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Easy for beginner sushi makers
customer_reviews.text: We love going out for sushi but thought that we should try making it ourselves. We ordered this set and it is incredible. Easy to use and clean! We are still learning how to roll correctly but the rolling mat makes it pretty easy! Pretty easy for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, only thing...use wax paper on top when you are getting ready to roll, not so easy to clean when the rice gets between the slats of rolling mat.
customer_reviews.author: Casie

customer_reviews.title: Price, quality and easy
customer_reviews.text: I loved Avery piece of this kit. Very good quality. This was my first time making sushi and being that it was a keto roll it was still so easy to make. Highly recommend it. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: M.Pal

customer_reviews.title: Great kit at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Such a lovely little kit for sushi. Very well made from good quality bamboo. Easy to clean if suggested plastic wrap used. Excellent price and great little zip strip case to hold all sushi making implements in one place. Had trouble with pdf guide, but contacted seller and succeeded. Very quick response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I spent a couple extra bucks and got this one over a cheaper one. The quality is well worth it. It comes with an instructional pdf file which is a nice gesture. I did find a wooden spoon doesn’t work as well as a textured plastic spoon but that’s just me. Great product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but missing user’s guide
customer_reviews.text: We did not receive a user’s guide. Otherwise the product is fine. The little enclosed message said it was available as a PDF, but apparently it is not after we checked.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use if you use it correctly
customer_reviews.text: It is really easy to use but the clean up is a little time consuming. If you are doing traditional rolls then the longest part of clean up is drying (the cords holding the bamboo together needs extra time to dry). If you are doing the americanized version then you can use food wrap as a barrier, cleaning up stickey rice is not worth skipping the wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Surpirse
customer_reviews.text: Took my husband to a sushi class with a chef and got these for him too. He loves them! Definitely hand wash and be patient enough to clean it well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Essary

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product shipped fast, had 2 bamboo rollers and quality chop sticks. I used it the first day we had it and made some decent sushi(as I have not made sushi in years). For the cost, this was the best fit!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Vandegriff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Received this the other day and the wife and I had our own Sushi night at home...I did not realize there were 2 mats in the package which was a nice little surprise...everything is made of good quality materials, easy to use and a good fun activity for date night at home. I will be getting a few more as gifts for a few friends...good product, received it quickly and for the price you cannot go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Stegner

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to smell paint, not a sushi
customer_reviews.text: I’m so upset with this item! It is well packed, nice design, but chemical smell still didn’t go away. I wish it wouldn’t be so bad
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: Better then I thought
customer_reviews.text: It’s not flimsy pretty good, the chopsticks are thicker then I thought they were they look like some good quality. overall for what I paid, I’m impressed. Thought I’d use these for now to Learn and buy a good set when I knew what I was doing but I see now these are gonna work out.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Martinez

customer_reviews.title: for 1st timers is a must
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time making sushi and this product made it easier, it has all one would need to make sushi. Great product built to last as long as you take care of it
customer_reviews.author: BIGBEEFYRAY

customer_reviews.title: Easy sushi for 1st timers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a sushi gift basket I put together for a Christmas Gift. We were able to make sushi as a family. The utensils worked well to scoop and spread rice on the nori sheets, much better than metal ustensils. We used plastic wrap between the nori sheet and rolling mat to keep clean. This was easy for my 12 year old to use.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

product_meta.title: Sushi Making Kit, Bamboo Sushi Mat, Including 2 Sushi Rolling Mats, 5 Pairs of Chopsticks, 1 Paddle, 1 Spreader, 1 Beginner Guide PDF, Roll On, Beginner Sushi Kit
feature_bullets: Free PDF using guide - your purchase includes a helpful home sushi instruction guide that will be emailed to you when the product ships. The easy-to-follow, step-by-step instructions are designed for beginners and first-time sushi makers. Discover the easy way to prepare sushi rice at home, learn how to roll the sushi, and unlock six Easy recipes that you can make with your kit. With this basic guide, you can approach sushi making with confidence and expert insight
Natural bamboo material - each product in the sushi making kit is constructed of top quality bamboo material. And there are no splinters and no unraveling of the cotton string stitching.
Highly detailed - enjoy making new foods at home for your family and practice eating homemade sushi with chopsticks that feature detailed, exotic designs on the handle.
Complete kit - this is the best complete sushi kit for Beginners with 2 sushi rolling mats, 5 pairs of chopsticks, 1 rice spreader, and 1 rice paddle.
Guaranteed - purchase with confidence – every order is backed by a 100% money back guarantee and all brand-new items are hand packaged and sealed in zip lock bags.
